programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 50 Girls In Love - In The 80s

programme.title: Monday Night at the Movies!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Monday Night at the Movies!
programme.desc: Popcorn at the ready, these are NOW 80s' biggest songs from the movies. But don't forget to switch off those mobile phones!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every Number 1 of the 80s!
programme.desc: In order - Mark Goodier's 11 hour journey through the decade's biggest number 1 songs, from Abba and Adam Ant, to Wham, Madonna, Rick Astley and Kylie Minogue.

programme.title: That's NOT My Name! 1980-1989
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 That's NOT My Name! 1980-1989
programme.desc: Barry Pincus, Gaynor Hopkins & Helen Folasade Adu were 3 of the world's biggest stars of the 80s - but all went under snappier (& better!) showbiz names for their music careers!

programme.title: 40 One-Hit Wonders with Pat Sharp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 40 One-Hit Wonders with Pat Sharp
programme.desc: They all had 1 defining chart smash - then never darkened our top 20 again! Our One-Hit stars include Judy Boucher, The Vapors, Matthew Wilder & Midnight Oil.

programme.title: Long Hot Summer!
programme.desc: All 80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!

programme.title: It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.desc: Once these tracks made it to the top spot there was no knocking them off! This is our countdown of the 50 longest chart toppers of the 1980s!

programme.title: How Rock SHOOK The World!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 How Rock SHOOK The World!

programme.desc: From 'Please Don't Go' in 1980 to 'Don't Know Much' in 1989 - these are simply the 50 biggest love & break-up songs of the decade, in order.

programme.title: Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Soft Rock & Power Pop!

programme.title: Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.desc: From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.

programme.title: A Touch of Class! Top 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A Touch of Class! Top 30
programme.desc: Keyboards, crooners & cabaret - mum & dad would have bored you senseless on their 8-track in the car, but now these quality tunes just sound class! 30 class acts - and their songs.

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.desc: We didn't yet call them Power Ballads, but some masters of the genre - Boston, Toto & Whitesnake - were already at it! Simes has 25 power pop love songs & ballads - in order.

programme.title: Cuddle on the Couch - The Love 40
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cuddle on the Couch - The Love 40
programme.desc: 3 hours of 70s love. What more could you ask for a long smooch on the sofa?

programme.title: Help Me Make It Through the Night!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Help Me Make It Through the Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back all night, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.desc: We didn't yet call them Power Ballads, but some masters of the genre - Boston, Toto & Whitesnake - were already at it! Simes has 25 power pop love songs & ballads - in order.

programme.title: Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.desc: Simon Bates with a celebration of a decade - the 50 biggest pure pop hits of the 70s. He's got a bucketload of Boney M, oodles of the Osmonds & an armful of Abba!

programme.title: 1970 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1970!

programme.title: Blimey! Wasn't It Bigger? 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Blimey! Wasn't It Bigger? 1970-79
programme.desc: Every one of these great songs is a classic. Yet none of them ever made the Top 10 in the 70s, despite being from superstars like Bowie, Abba, The Who and more. You'll be shocked!

programme.title: Timewarp TV! 1977
programme.desc: 60 songs from a classic year of 70s pop - 1977!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1977!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1977 & dance yourself through a long year of disco, pop, soul, country, rock & punk. With ELO & Abba, Queen & Kenny Rogers!

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1977
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1977 - a year when David Soul & disco were kings! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Every Number 2 of 1977
programme.desc: Runners-up from the UK charts in 1977 - those 11 songs that didn't quite mae it & got stuck behind long running chart toppers from Abba, Donna Summer, Elvis Presley & Wings.

programme.title: Cuddle on the Couch - The Love 40
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cuddle on the Couch - The Love 40
programme.desc: 3 hours of 70s love. What more could you ask for a long smooch on the sofa?

programme.title: Who Won Wot in 1977?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Won Wot in 1977?
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with 1977's big music award winners.

programme.title: All Day - It's 1977!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1977 & dance yourself through a long year of disco, pop, soul, country, rock & punk. With ELO & Abba, Queen & Kenny Rogers!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1977
programme.desc: If you thought 1977 was all about punk - you might want to think again! Simon Bates brings you a Silver Jubilee year full of pop, soul, disco, country, love & a little bit of rock!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1977!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1977 & dance yourself through a long year of disco, pop, soul, country, rock & punk. With ELO & Abba, Queen & Kenny Rogers!

programme.title: The 1977 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 1977 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.desc: 60 minutes of power pop & rock! Earplugs at the ready as we rewind to 1977 with Rod Stewart, Boston, Ram Jam & the Sex Pistols!
